values:
I went to the Delta Zeta formal last night it was pretty cool. I got really pissed off though because they played the fucking phi kap song twice. It shouldn't have been played once but when people are already calling this dance a fucking phi kap social and they play the song well that adds to the insult. Don't get me wrong the Phi Kaps are cool guys BUT there were guys from Sig Ep, Sigma Nu, me from Sigma Pi and some independents and that was really shitty that they make a HUGE ass deal about the fucking Phi Kap song. Not only did they play it twice but the fucking girls got all into the song and then the girls got pissed at me and some of the other guys for not wanting to dance to it. i wouldn't make the DZs dance to the fucking Zeta song or the fucking AOPi song so don't make me dance to the fucking Phi Kap song and once again they are cool guys but it is rude to pull that shit that is like the Yankees playing the American anthem twice when the Toronto Blue Jays come into town and totally ignoring the Canadian anthem just not cool.  

I had a good time though so don't get me wrong and once again the guys in Phi kap are awesome but that did rub me the wrong way

You Know You're From Virginia When...
Speed limits are just suggestions You have at least two friends who have no idea what their relatives do...because its "top secret" government work Most of your senior class wend to Mason, JMU, Tech, VCU or UVA When people ask where you're from, you tell them DC because its easier to explain You've never told someone you're from Virginia without putting "northern," "central," or "southern" in front of it (See above.) It's not actually tailgating unless your bumper is touching the car in front of you. You know yellow light means at least 5 more cars can get through. (Yeah, man...at least. Probably also happens everywhere else.) A red light means 2 more can. You actually know what the black boxes at stoplights are for. Despite the fact that Virginia fought for the south in the Civil War, you are not, under any circumstances, a "southerner" You are amused by visiting relatives who are actually excited to see Washington, DC You took a field trip to Williamsburg as a kid You are amazed when you go out of town and the people at McDonalds speak English You or someone in your family has a Smart Tag An inch of snow and you miss 3 days of school All the potholes just add a little excitement to your driving experience Crown Victoria = undercover cop Subway is a fast food place. The transportation system is known as Metro, and only Metro. They just tore down the old farm house across the street and put 12 new McMansions in its place For the cost of your house, you could own a small town in Iowa If you stay on the same road long enough, it will eventually have three new names. You have to dial the area code to call your neighbor "Vacation" means spending a day at King's Dominion or Busch Gardens. "Going to the River" means any stream with water. You have never been served tea without the waitress asking "sweet or unsweetened?" Your favorite past time is telling West Virginia jokes. Anyone who can't trace his or her ancestry back to at least four generations in Virginia is an outsider. "Going to the beach" means anywhere from Ocean City to Virginia Beach to Myrtle Beach. You actually get these jokes and pass them on to other friends from Virginia.


Get Your Own "You Know You're From" Meme Here

More cool things for your blog at Blogthings
this is great I so totally feel this. 1)speed limits and VA are such a joke no one follows them but the cops will get you for a mile over 2)that top secret thing so true so true 3)most of my senior class does attend good schools like Mason UVA VCU or Tech while I'm stuck at Shepherd and JSU 4)That Dc thing works no matter were you are in Virginia it worked for me even when I lived by Va beach but still I do have family from the DC area 5)I usually say Northern Virginia or Newport News 6)tailgating is worse everywhere else 7)the red light thing has stopped since they added the camaras 8)blackboxes=camaras be carefull 9)I like to say I'm from the civilized south 10)I love DC but seriously people that get overly excited about DC or Va Beach get on my nerves 11)I've been on like 15 million field trips to Williamsburg and Jamestown 12)the fast food workers in Nova are the worse with the foerign languages 13)smart tag is the only way to get to work on time innorva and from Yorktown to Newport news shipbuilding 14)ha an inch of snow means a week off from school 15)the potholes are more of a Norva thing 16)and Chevy Capris too 17)I don't know I call the Metro the subway Metro kicks ASS 18)and there will be thousands more mcmansions until they cover the state of Virginia at this rate but hey a 4 hour comute to work in DC is hardly a comute 19)damn I could own half of Alabama for the cost of a Norva Mcmansion but my house in Newport News is only worth as much as Jacksonville, Al 20)Robert E Lee parkway turns into George Washington Parkway turns into Colonial Parkway turns into AHHHHHHHH 21)757 22)and depending on were you live depends on wether Bush Gardens or Kings Dominion are better 23)man that is why everyone laughs at what I call rivers 24)at least in Virginia they ask 25)I love WV jokes 26)I'm technically an outsider but don't tell 27)I lived 15 mintues from Virginia Beach yet I never went to Virginia Beach Myrtle Beach only all my friends went to Nags Head unless they were poor

Homecoming pagent was awesome. One of my brothers told asked who I was going to hit on that night and I told him I didn't know it's a suprise. The suprise worked out well and we have a new runner in the contract singing derby. The Buffalo sabres and I hooked up last night and probably again tonight but this deal is more of a rent a player thing you know for their hunt for the Cup I really don't want to sign any long term deals with her but she could be fun to play for. The New Jersey Devils have spoken with others about contract negotiations BUT they haveyet to contact me AND when I have spoken with her she shows little interest but my "agent" says she wants me on her team.

The Cardinals are playing the Red Sox in the World Series go Cardinals Jess should be happy when I see her in Government. :)

I was invited to the Delta Zeta formal as a starter andnot a back up but at this point I don't have money to rent a tux. 

I realized last night though that my Sigma Pi brothers think I'm a pimp but I realized that only a few of my teams are Stanley Cup quality. Looking at those girls in the pagent only made me want to better  my game even more and damn I'm still not in the same league as Dani McLean but I'm probably inviting her to Sigma Pi's formal when we have it.

So on my free agency (dating thing) It looks like I have a few seriouse competitors

So of course Super Nova is the Washington Capitals in this scenario and of course if I had my way I'd be a Capital but last night I considered some other contracts that I have been offered.

I have recently been flooded with offers from at least 30 girls which helps this annology out greatly because there are 30 NHL teams. I have really narrowed the choices down though. I won't play for the Penguins so there goes one but last night I hung out with an Opra major who will be represented by the Ottawa Senators (man I'm so Peter Bondra like) I hung out with her before I a few times before I met Super Nova or Sigma Pi and I really liked her but I just never really got a chance to hang out with her. Due to ROTC forcing me to volunteer at the football game though and her going through the wrong gate I was able to hang out with her all night. She helped me take tickets and just hung out with me it was awesome. We went and hung out with my brothers for part of the game and then headed back to my place were we rocked out to Good Charlotte and I found out that the Virginia tourism moto is a good come on line. 

Me:something dumb about Virginia
her:isn't Virginia for lovers
me:yeah let me show you

ROCK ON she almost gave me a hickey though but damn it was sexy as hell and I think the Ottawa Senators are a pretty cool team.

Now don't get me wrong I am also looking at offers from girls who represent the New Jersey Devils, the Atlanta Thrashers, the Chicago Blackhawks, the Nashville Predators, and the Carolina Huricanes BUT these offers are only being politely reviwed because I think I have definatly narrowed it down to the Caps and Senators at this point with of course the Caps leading by a large margin but due to one problem lets just say that they have a player on their team who hurts team chemistry we'll call him Jaromir Jagr it could stall the signing phase. Also don't get me wrong I will so totally sing with the Rangers if they send me a quality contract it's to early to say any thing really. 

MAN BEING SINGLE KICKS ASS AND MAN I LIKE HOCKEY TO MUCH AND MAN I'M SUCH A SQEEZ NOW

so today is family day at JSU but hey my family can't come but whatever I'm a man I can live with that. 

Last night was awesome I got to know my brother Danny aka Greg (at least I call him Greg) very well Greg kicks ass and we are trying to figure out a way that we can be roomates and make Blue leave. We went to the best place on earth according to my roomate Oxford last night. I was kind of upset because I didn't see the legendary oxford band who from what blue tells me is the coolest group of people around. We then watched movies with our brother Joseph and our friend Merideth. Eurotrip was just as good the second time I saw it and hey you got to love that song "scotty doesn't know Scotty doesn't know" it holds a special place in my heart now. We then watched Mallrats which is one of my all time favorites just because that movie and the upright citizens brigade got me over the whole Lauren Ross thing in 10th grade.

Cavi couldn't come down tonight :( but he'll come down some day

Hockey is still on strike BUT the AHL isn't and the Norfolk Admirals beat the hated Hershey Bears 3-2 :) and they go at it again tonight in Hershey go ADMIRALS but I'd still rather be cheering for the Caps :(

Today I have to work the JSU football game that I was forced to "volunteer" to do by ROTC but at half time I can hang out with my brothers and plus I get 5 bucks so suck it ROTC

I talked to my dad last night he sent me a check for my fraternity money and his letter kicked ass. I love the hell out of my dad and he is really proud of me being in sigma pi. I talked to him on the phone to thank him and he was really happy for me . 

Oh I skipped all but one class yesterday. I was about to go to math until my friend Ohio Aaron from Sig Ep stopped me and we went to breakfast and picked up his car from the house.  I then went to State and Local governement because my buddy Jess is in there and class was awesome. Then I said fuck going to Sociology I'm to damn tired so I hung out with sorority girls and then passed out in Joseph's room while he went to class overall it was an awesome day and I think this weekend will kick ass just because it started with such a good thursday night Sigma Pi part.

oh that party kicked ass and I got to hug Dani McClean and my brothers are going to help me talk to her she is an aO pie so rock on. Don't tell my alpha z friend though ;)

the only bad thing is i have a damn cold

So I realized why i like it here a lot more than shepherd. The political environment isn't all idolizations like shepherd. Shepherd students belive the government will and should give them the world and how those who oppose equality are evil. While the majority of JSU students realize the government is flawed  our politicians fuck up but we need to vote according to common sence and reality. 

On that subject though my roomate now feels I'm racist because Tokir and I were talking about Bush and Kerry and Will kept interupting and I said listen are you going to vote he said no so I said well don't waste my time by making me listen to your voice because if you don't vote your voice doesn't matter. Then I explained to him what my government teacher told us that most Kerry supporters don't vote and when I told him that I pciked my words wrong and said "most people like you don't even vote" so he assumes I hate black people but he is a fucking idiot and no one likes him anyways and besides I know I'm not racist. Plus besides that dumb ass lit his face on fire

oh yeah my three fears lets go indepth like I promised.

1)heights I just can't stand them uless I have a railing or something 

2)stingrays scare the shit out of me I'm always worried that while wading in the ocean or even the Potomac river in the mountians or in mountain lakes or streams that I'll get stung by one even though I know the chance is slim to none

3)alice and wonderland was a fucked up movie and for some reason when I was a kid my grandpa and mom thought I loved it and made me watch it all the time I would cry whenever I saw that movie I HATE it even today it's jsut fucked up maybe if I was a stoner I'd love it

Oh yeah I beat Joseph's ass twice today I'm undefeated.

1)Heights
2)Stingrays
3)Alice and Wonderland

I also hung out with Jessta this weekend and I met her boyfriend or whatever Preston he is pretty cool so I'm so totally going to try to get him that spot that I "promised" John.

That has to be one of my favorite things in Rules of Attraction because Victor kicks so much ass and if you don't pay attention you'd miss it.

I'd much rather hang out at JSU then in Rome. This summer I'll be spending most of my time in DC and when I am in Rome I'll probably be chilling with Cavi and some people I met here at JSU. Then it's off to bootcamp :( but hey I guess It'll make me a man. Well I have to get ready for my Sigma Pi meeting and I'm hoping to God I listen to the Yeah Yeah Yeahs tonight that would be the icing on the cake for a great week.

He is a cool guy though and if he goes sigma pi he has my vote but i sure love listening to the yeah yeah yeahs with her so I really hoping that continues but i guess i'll need a new date for formal. We all fell asleep afterwards and then this morning I beat joey's ass hahahahahahahaha I made him surrender like France. Then I came to Rome.

where we began 

This is Victor my life is an extrodinary event. That song has no meaning other than the fact that the song is beautiful and it is running in my head like 24/7. It's all a champaign super nova in her eyes and just chilling with my fellow sigma pi. Joseph is my brother now kick ass but he is also Livy's dad(?) I don't know what is up with that. I hung out with super nova aka skeezy mckgee after class it was pretty cool we ate lunch with some of my brothers (I love being able to say that) and I met our sweetheart who is awesome sigma pi loves you Cambry (sorry if I spelled it wrong). I also helped introduce super nova to Cambry so I hope she goes ZTA. I smell sex and candy (man that song rocks). I feel so good and energized today people were coming out all around to introduce themselves to me I felt like I was a king or something it was so presidential or governor of virginia. The other night I was really tired and I was bitching about shit to Joseph and I said i wanted to start a buffalo farm. I don't know why i wanted to buy a buffalo farm but after I read the Catcher in the Rye I wanted to own one because I felt kind of down but fuck the buffalo farm life is an amazing thing damn I'm in contact personally with the AOPi social head, the DZ girl's, Phi mu and ZTA o yeah Alpha Z to man it kicks ass being in a frat. Alright Victor Ward is out and hell yeah my nephew Trent is so going to be a legacy when he gets old enough and I have a nickname now they call me mongo lord knows why but I'm like awesome I'm the first guy in Sigma Pi at JSU with a nickname given to him by the other brothers at least that I know of

so I saw that chick again we watched Rules of Attraction for like my 51st time ever and her 1st and she liked it. The fact that she liked ROA is a major plus. She couldn't stay the night again though which sucked but it was ok because paul bunyon lied about not staying the night and came back like 30 minutes after she left. It was fun though because we listened to the Yeah Yeah Yeahs and made out and just talked kind of like a more mature middle school date. After she left I put in Taking Back Sunday's new CD and totally passed out on my bed. I slept so much yesterday to make up for not sleeping friday night. I almost fell asleep at the football game that JSU won :) at the game I hung out with Justin and Joseph and a few of the sigma pi brothers which kicked ass. I really like these guys and I can't wait until 7 when we become official. I think I'll work on keeping my tan today  because it feels beautiful outside but I have to do laundry and shit. Life kicks ass and I know I was bitching about shi last night before I went to bed for good but man I was tired as hell and can you really belive someone who says they want to leave everything behind and just start a buffalo ranch (which would be awesome though)seriously though life kicks ass

I got the call last night. I have recieved a bid from Sigma Pi I am going to be a founding father of the JSU chapter. http://www.sigmapi.org/ . I can't wait until sunday when we officially colonize.

Last night we went out to this bar Brother's to go check out one of my new brother's band. It was pretty cool. I met this awesome girl there who I thought was very hot. We wound up hanging out in the Daug. It turns out she is in my government class and I didn't even realize it but to my defence she didn't either so it's all good. You know it is pretty damn hard to miss one hot chick who sits in front of you in a class with 10 people in it. She also works a civilian job for the national guard unit i'm assigned to in huntsville how about that patriot missile's and a hot chick kick ass. I hope I see her again tonight I had so much fun.

I'm chilling at the football game today go gamecocks beat murray state and my other gamecocks beat the alabama crimson tide

So yesterday was awesome. 

I have gotten a sorta bid to be a founding father of JSU's newest IFC fraternity Sigma Pie (they told me to have the check for 150 writen out to them so I'm pretty sure I'm in). On sunday we colonize and then it is my job and my brother's job to learn everything about the frat and look for guys who will help represent our fraternity. I can't wait until Sunday when I get my founders pin.

I leave to take my ASVAB today which should be awesome. I get to stay in Nashville for free but tomorrow I have to get my physical after which I will be a member of the Army National Guard. 

I really am looking foward to this sunday I can't wait to be on first name basis with all the sorority girls and to be a part of a true brotherhood. Oh yeah my name will forever be on the original cjharter for the fraternity and when we get our house built people will know my name for years to come it kicks so much ass. Charlie get your act together and come to JSU in the spring because I am gurenteeing you a bid.

Well the next football game after we colonize is in 2 weeks so I can't wait to go out there and help recruit so we can charter wish me and my future brothers luck. Mary let your DZ sister's at Shepherd know that Sigma Pie in Jacksonville Alabama is who they need to know.

Oh yeah why the hell are babe the blue ox and paul bunyon hanging out all the time. damn those two dumbasses where at waffle house 2 nights in a row for the enitre night and it isn't like paul bunyon isn't cool it is just the fact that his tall tales are getting really old. Babe the blue ox is a little faglapper though and he is not welcome to hang around me at all. Maybe if Paul Bunyon cleans up his act and learns how to treat women I'll help him out in the spring to get into sigma pie but if he keeps acting the way he is he is not going to get in and the fact that he hangs out with babe is really hurting him more.

and if I weren't sad enough today check this shit out I'm about to cry in the library I'm such a fucking dork

My goal in life is still to have sex in Virginia. Damn I haven't even gone past 1st base in VA. I've gone all the way in West Virginia, been to 3rd in Maryland, Pensylvania, South Carolina, Georgia, and Tenessee but I have yet to find a chick to do it with in good old Virginia. That shit bothers me too seeing how I lived in VA for like 18 years and have yet to do shit there

ok so yeah last night sucked ass and has thereby ruined today. 

Last night the plan was to rent Mean Girls and then sit and watch it with Audry. I had this all romantic night planned out it was going to kick ass. Well since I'm the Washington Capitals of life it didn't turn out like that at all. First off the walk to get Mean Girls took a lot longer than I though because we ran into Livy befor heading out and Livy told us an hour long story about losing her wallet which I didn't mind but it was fucking with my plan. Also Blue was all bitching at me because I hang out with Audry a lot and he said that it should be bros before hoes whatever. Well we walked there and got the movie and had a generally good time of it. 

Upon returning we decided not to watch the movie since Blue stayed in the room but I remedied this by saying hey Audry lets go study under the stars in the quad. Well this plan was kicking ass until we had the talk.

The talk sucked so much ass. It was the I love Chris, but I love you Michael but we can't be together because I have loved Chris for 4 years speech. The speech revolved around the fact that if she was single we'd be dating, if her and Chris had been together for only a few months we'd be dating and that since it has been 4 years though she can not leave him no matter how much she cares for me. ok so if this speech didn't already suck it sucked even more when Livy comes in the middle of it and interupts us for another hour about her damn cell phone ringtone. I don't have a problem with Livy but this message needs to go out for everybody who would do something like this. IF TWO PEOPLE ARE SITTTING ALONE TOGETHER UNDERNEATH THE STARS AND ONE PERSON HAS THEIR HEAD IN THE OTHER'S LAP THAT MEANS DO NOT DISTURB DO NOT BUG THEM WITH SHIT YOU CAN OBVIOUSLY TALK ABOUT LATER.like i said though I'm not pissed at Livy and I know you read this Livy but honestly that shit was not cool

Then to make my night even worse I almost popped Whitey in the face. the ra shawn finally got the balls to ask a girl out and he got stood up so whitey makes fun of him well that shit is not cool I was really proud of shawn and we all almost beat Whitey's ass I also told Whitey I don't ever want to hear him mention Audry's name ever again because if she isn't dating me there is no way in hell she will ever date him and she doesn't even like the kid as a friend so fuck off whitey.

Also I am very pissed that this one chick tried to show pity for me last night that shit is not cool and I know you mean well but it could have waited this person did not have to call me right after the incident happen and I am very pissed at the person you know who you are and I am still yolur friend but seriously do not talk to me for a few days and if you do DO NOT MENTION THIS SHIT

Today has been better though I've actually gotten a few #'s and stuff so kick ass. I'm thinking about having a Victor Ward weekend it will be so awesome. I might be buying some Vallum just so I can totally feel like I'm in a Brett Easton Ellis book because this shit is so Rules of Attraction

ok i stole this from my friend josh's LJ because hey it is about my dumb ass brother Sean. I think he is in jail and that is where he needs to be for what he did ok read what he did

Josh LJ:i had to help convict a felon on thursday-- so i had to miss school-- thursday night sean decided to go onto base.. with shawn-- toi get money withou havuing to pay the 2
.00 surcharge...and sean-- being sean-- had a TON of illegal weapons in his car. let's go down the list-- we got busted.. WE because I was in the car too-- WE got busted for 

3 swords of various length
1 billy club
1 baseball bat wth various colors of paint and dents all over it
1 illegal bowie knife
and added to that, a case of smirnoff... 

buuut we would have gotten off with nothingmore than a simple confiscation if it weren;t for the handgun. DAMN SEAN;S STUPOID ASS. it was a pellet gun.. but it was a look alike.. and when the cops found it.. MAN were they pissed. haha.. the only reason sean wasn't arrested right then and there was because when they picked it up, it was lighter thna a real handgun. damn sean's stupid ass...end Josh's LJ

Since September 11, 2001, Americans and Canadians have come together as never before in our generation. We have banded together to overcome tremendous adversity. We have weathered direct attacks on our own soil, wars overseas, corporate/government scandal, layoffs, unemployment, stock price plunges, droughts, fires, mad cow, SARS, high gasoline prices, and a myriad of economic and physical disasters both great and small. But now, we must come together once again to overcome our greatest challenge yet.

Hundreds of Professional Hockey players in our very own nation are going to be locked out, living at well below the seven-figure salary level.
And as if that weren't bad enough they could be deprived of their life giving pay for several months, possibly longer, as a result of the upcoming lockout situation. But you can help!

For only $20,835 a month, about $694.50 a day(that's less than the cost a large screen projection TV) you can help an NHL player remain economically viable during his time of need. Your contribution by no means solves the problem as it barely covers the annual minimum salary, but it's a start, and every little bit will help!

Although $700 may not seem like a lot of money to you, to a hockey player it could mean the difference between spending the lockout golfing in Florida or on a Mediterranean cruise. For you, seven hundred dollars is nothing more than a month's rent, half a mortgage payment, or a month of medical insurance, but to a hockey player, $700 will partially replace his daily salary.

Your commitment of less than $700 a day will enable a player to buy that home entertainment center, trade in the year-old Lexus for a new Ferrari, or enjoy a weekend in Rio.



HOW WILL I KNOW I'M HELPING?

Each month, you will receive a complete financial report on the player you sponsor. Detailed information about his stocks, bonds, 401(k), real estate, and other investment holdings will be mailed to your home. Plus, upon signing up for this program, you will receive an unsigned photo of the player lounging during the lockout on a beach somewhere in the Caribbean (for a signed photo, please include an additional $150). Put the photo on your refrigerator to remind you of other peoples' suffering.


HOW WILL HE KNOW I'M HELPING?

Your NHL player will be told that he has a SPECIAL FRIEND who just wants to help in a time of need. Although the player won't know your name, he will be able to make collect calls to your home via a special operator in case additional funds are needed for unforeseen expenses.


YES, I WANT TO HELP!
